settings.title: Sagrada Madre
settings.text_general: Sagrada Madre is a family business dedicated to offering natural incense and smudging products. We work with Mother Earth through the conscientious use of ecological products while maintaining sustainability of resources and fair trade at all levels.
settings.text_women: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book.
settings.text_sports: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book.

settings.title: Are your ingredients sustainably and legally sourced?
settings.text: Yes. Our ingredients are sourced responsibly, with a strong focus on sustainability and respect for nature.

settings.title: Do you sell directly to retailers and distributors?
settings.text: Yes. We sell directly to retailers and distributors. For further information, please contact us at 386-588-3231.

settings.title: How long does one incense stick or brick burn?
settings.text: Burn time depends on the product. On average, our incense sticks burn for approximately 45 to 60 minutes.

settings.title: Which products are best for first-time customers?
settings.text: Our best sellers include Natural Yagra, Incense Palo Santo, Natural Rosemary, and Cosmos Sun. While all of our products are thoughtfully made, these selections are a great place to start.

settings.title: Where are your products manufactured?
settings.text: Our products are manufactured in Argentina, where Sagrada Madre was founded and continues to produce its incense and aromatic products with care and respect for natural traditions.
